item.title: How to test a Roslyn analyzer
item.description: When you write a Roslyn analyzer, you should also write tests for it. The Roslyn SDK provides a set of NuGet packages that you can use to test your analyzers. In this post, I describe how to test a Roslyn analyzer using the Roslyn SDK NuGet packages. First, Roslyn SDK NuGet packages are not available on NuGet.org.
